Hawke’s Bay Tui pull a stunner out of the hat, beating Auckland at Eden Park https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-tui-pull-a-stunner-out-of-the-hat-beating-auckland-at-eden-park/ MLTVGDAGHNAIDBA2XFGUF67ZTE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-tui-pull-a-stunner-out-of-the-hat-beating-auckland-at-eden-park/ MLTVGDAGHNAIDBA2XFGUF67ZTE/ Doug LaingHawke's Bay needed something uplifting and it came in New Zealand’s biggest sports stadium Sun, 22 Sep 2024 02:26:33 +0000 Hawke's Bay Tui flanker Tempryss Lauvao celebrates after scoring one of her two first-half tries in an upset 48-24 over defending champions Auckland Storm in a Farah Palmer Cup national women's rugby competition match at Eden Park, Auckland, on Sunday. Photo / Blake Armstrong - action press
